craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 15 bonus Ability Power and 15% Critical Strike Chance.

Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities cost 10 less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

[Aura item]

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Every 2 seconds, regenerate 4% maximum Health.

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and 35 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

​​[Aura item]

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

craf.name: Guardbreaker
craf.add_attrs: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage for 3 seconds.

craf.name: GuardianAngel

Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become stealthed, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. Then, grant 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
- +15 Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

craf.add_attrs: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
50% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Grant 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
